articles.author: Aidin Vaziri
articles.title: Melatonin for sleep linked to 90% higher risk of heart failure, study finds - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: A new American Heart Association study finds long-term melatonin use as a sleep aid may raise the risk of heart failure and death among adults with insomnia.
articles.content: Over-the-counter sleep aids are displayed for sale in a store. A new American Heart Association study finds long-term melatonin use as a sleep aid may raise the risk of heart failure and death among … [+2785 chars]
